title: I am unable to start lol !!!
body:
Hi, for more than 3 days, I no longer able to launch lol, I put in 'execute as administrator' and I even uninstalled lol and still the same problem.
It said:' Unable to connect to the HTTP server. Please ensure that you are connected to the Internet and your para-fire is not blocking access.' Help me please: C.
PS: Sorry for my English I am Quebecois.

replies.body:
The connection error you're seeing is often caused by conflicting local network configurations that block League from reaching the servers properly. There are a number of settings that could be causing the issue, but the connection guide that *Rineyy* linked is a fantastic starting point in troubleshooting this issue. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.

Sounds like a connection issue. [Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
